alert.note: Alert for Adair; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN RUSSELL AND ADAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Columbia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Russell Springs, Christine, Portland, Cundiff, Gadberry, Royville, Sano, Bliss and Fairplay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
